properties.entry: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, WRITER, CONTENT, IS_ANONIMOUS) VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT REPLY_NO, R.CONTENT, NICK_NAME, R.ENROLL_DATE, R.IS_ANONIMOUS FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
